metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bergen has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Bergen is written in the key of F Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 6th most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 35th most popular  among all keys. The F Dorian scale is similar to the F Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (D).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree. 

See the F Dorian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
